data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the dry winter monsoon, the weather will be generally fine with cold morning over Guangdong tomorrow. With the monsoon moderating slightly during the weekend, temperatures will rise slightly over southern China, but it will still be cool in the morning. An easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of southern China early next week. It will be windy over the region. A dry northeast monsoon will bring mainly fine weather to the coast of Guangdong in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260109","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Fine and very dry.
